text: In logon se agar tum pucho ke zameen aur aasmaano ko kisne paida kiya hai to yeh khud kahenge ke Allah ne. Insey kaho, jab haqeeqat yeh hai to tumhara kya khayal hai ke agar Allah mujhey koi nuksaan pahunchana chahe to kya tumhari yeh dewiyan (godess) jinhein tum Allah ko chodh kar pukarte ho, mujhey uske pahunchaye huey nuksaan se bacha lengi? Ya Allah mujh par meharbani karna chahe to kya yeh uski rehmat ko roak sakengi? Bas insey kehdo ke mere liye Allah hi kaafi hai, bharosa karne waley usi par bharosa karte hain
